message:
SYSTEM: FernandezM.Feb2019.pdf: Página 3
Introduction
Main idea
Even though one of the main characteristics of ontologies has always been
claimed to be their reusability, throughout this paper it will be shown that
ontology reuse across a given domain is not a consolidated practice.
Moreover, some of the causes of this fact will be inferred and described.
Links
